arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola indicates the strength of his midfield through a selection ‘headache’ for Newcastle
arts.sum: Bafode is also training well - I wouldn't say he is 100% but I would expect him to also be available." The midfield unit is a big strength for Newcastle United, but with a week of rest and a strong roster, Bournemouth are giving the "best headaches" to Andoni Iraola as to how he handles this challenge.

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola insists Newcastle United ‘deserve more points’ from performances this season
arts.sum: Andoni Iraola is sure his eyes do not deceive him about Newcastle United, feeling that the Toon "deserve more points" this year. They added big quality players to a very good team and we will have to be ready.”
